name: Share of women with a bachelor's degree or higher in S&E and S&E-related occupations: Selected years, 2010–21
description: Share of women with a bachelor's degree or higher in S&E and S&E-related occupations: Selected years, 2010–21

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

notes: Data include both the civilian and active-duty working population. STEM middle-skill occupations are excluded because the data source does not allow for the separation of STEM middle-skill occupations from non-STEM occupations. Historic estimates for 2010, 2013, and 2015 have been updated from previously published reports.
sources: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics, National Survey of College Graduates (NSCG), Public-Use Files, 2010–21, accessed 30 August 2023.Science and Engineering Indicators
